code:
# @param {Integer[]} nums
# @param {Integer} x
# @return {Integer}
def max_score(nums, x)
    total_score = nums[0]
    max_score = total_score
    last_odd_index = nums[0].odd? ? 0 : nil
    last_even_index = nums[0].even? ? 0 : nil

    (1...nums.size).each do |i|
        if nums[i].odd?
            total_score += nums[i]
            total_score -= x if !last_even_index.nil? && last_even_index < i
            last_odd_index = i
        else
            total_score += nums[i]
            total_score -= x if !last_odd_index.nil? && last_odd_index < i
            last_even_index = i
        end
        max_score = [max_score, total_score].max
    end

    max_score
end
